question: The "National Park of the East" is located in which country?
explanation: The National Park of the East is located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This national park, established in 1975, houses Isla Saona, the popular tourist destination of the Dominican Republic. This national park was added to UNESCO World Heritage Tentative List in 2001. The park preserves an extraordinary biological variety and numerous marine and terrestrial species threatened or endangered.
